duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, monitor, and manage enterprise-wide projects from initiation through completion.
Lead or coordinate enterprise-wide project planning, progress reporting, and troubleshooting.
Oversee multiple project teams to determine enterprise-wide resource requirements and estimate project costs.
Mitigate project risks, establish contingency plans, anticipate dependencies affected by ongoing project changes.
Manage enterprise-wide projects through the application of comprehensive project management concepts.
Maintain project documentation, including the plan, IT release readiness, communication plan, and deployment timeline.
Coordinate stakeholder and dependency meetings to ensure all ancillary teams, deliverables, and processes are on track.
Create and deliver project updates at Program Meetings and Product Day updates to Senior Managers, Directors, and Executive levels across IT, Product, and Service.
Manage project alignment, buy-in, and support of diverse stakeholders by building and maintaining relationships with internal partners, third-party vendors, and leadership.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Project Management, Business, or related field
